fr.escape.game.entity.weapons

Class AbstractWeapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.escape.game.entity.weapons.AbstractWeapon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Updateable, Weapon

    public abstract class AbstractWeapon
extends java.lang.Object
implements Weapon
    This class provide a skeletal implementation of any Weapon in the game.
